summary: This document is a chain of emails from February 2020 between attorneys at Panish Shea & Boyle LLP and an investigative team, primarily discussing the scheduling of meetings and interviews related to the SDNY's investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The emails reference a civil lawsuit filed on behalf of a victim, media coverage of the case, and plans to interview the victim's family members.

keyFacts: Attorneys are actively investigating and preparing a civil case related to Jeffrey Epstein on behalf of a victim in early 2020.
A civil lawsuit was filed on January 17, 2020, and received significant media coverage the following day.
The investigative team planned to interview the victim's siblings, mother, and other contacts for corroboration.
Judge John Koeltl and Magistrate Judge Barbara Moses were assigned to the civil lawsuit.
The correspondence shows careful coordination between legal counsel and investigators, including scheduling in-person meetings with the victim.
